title: Verify: Upgrade SQLAlchemy ORM to 2.0
description:
Run automated tests for task T-043.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Refactor SQLAlchemy ORM usage to new 2.0 style, including mapped_column and async patterns. Update Alembic migration scripts as needed.
Criteria:
- All ORM code uses SQLAlchemy 2.0 patterns
- Alembic migrations run successfully
- App starts and database operations work
acceptance_criteria: All ORM code uses SQLAlchemy 2.0 patterns
App starts and database operations work
